#set your path to this folder here!
cd dw/pymol/

#settings
bg_color white
set ray_opaque_background, true
set map_auto_expand_sym, 1
set mesh_width, 2
set antialias, 1
set direct, 0.5
util.ray_shadows('none')
set cartoon_gap_cutoff, 0
set ray_volume

load lysozyme_refine.pdb, hewl
util.cbaw hewl

set valence, 0
show sticks, (not hydrogens)
hide cartoon
set stick_radius, 0.2, not hydrogens
set sphere_scale,0.15

load_mtz lysozyme_refine_multivariate.mtz, Fobs, 2FOFCWT, PH2FOFCWT
map_double Fobs
load_mtz lysozyme_refine_multivariate.mtz, anom_m, ANOM, PHANOM
map_double anom_m
load_mtz lysozyme_refine_univariate.mtz, anom_u, ANOM, PHANOM
map_double anom_u


isomesh Fobs_mesh, Fobs, 1.5, hewl, carve=1.5
color gray, Fobs_mesh
isomesh anom_4s_m, anom_m, 4.0, hewl, carve=2
color hotpink, anom_4s_m

cmd.set_view((0.4992764890193939, -0.20368452370166779, -0.8421602845191956, -0.6275040507316589, 0.5852298140525818, -0.5135610699653625, 0.5974625945091248, 0.7848699688911438, 0.1643783301115036, 0.0, 0.0, -26.393409729003906, 8.09000015258789, 30.875, 16.5939998626709, 16.94440269470215, 35.842411041259766, -20.0))
cmd.png("png/multivariate_hewl_IOD_2.png",dpi=900)

center resi 3 and resn IOD
cmd.png("png/multivariate_hewl_IOD_3.png",dpi=900)

cmd.set_view((0.26856639981269836, 0.6955380439758301, 0.6664053201675415, 0.771835446357727, -0.5693023800849915, 0.28313371539115906, 0.5763149261474609, 0.4383167326450348, -0.6897403001785278, 2.789124846458435e-05, -5.1429495215415955e-05, -31.57726287841797, 28.10280418395996, 29.464210510253906, 2.07757568359375, 23.5703182220459, 39.583213806152344, -20.0))
cmd.png("png/multivariate_hewl_IOD_4_5.png",dpi=900)

center resi 6 and resn IOD
cmd.png("png/multivariate_hewl_IOD_6.png",dpi=900)

cmd.set_view((-0.6057301759719849, -0.4165765643119812, -0.6779016256332397, -0.5440981984138489, 0.8385155200958252, -0.029101712629199028, 0.580559492111206, 0.3512139618396759, -0.7345746159553528, -0.00033001508563756943, 0.00018499046564102173, -27.015634536743164, 25.70259666442871, 45.561431884765625, 16.985393524169922, 24.866107940673828, 29.16265106201172, -20.0))

cmd.set_view((0.4490524232387543, -0.42942261695861816, -0.7835447788238525, 0.38509753346443176, 0.884323000907898, -0.26395222544670105, 0.8062541484832764, -0.1832192838191986, 0.5624807476997375, -0.00036336504854261875, -6.668083369731903e-05, -27.01830291748047, 23.055927276611328, 38.008384704589844, 17.987834930419922, 24.38562774658203, 29.64564323425293, -20.0))
cmd.png("png/multivariate_hewl_CYS_76,94.png",dpi=900)

cmd.set_view((-0.24626758694648743, -0.36693546175956726, 0.8970527052879333, -0.054949235171079636, -0.9187858700752258, -0.39091137051582336, 0.9676414132118225, -0.14555633068084717, 0.206107497215271, 0.0, 0.0, -27.01830291748047, 11.96399974822998, 33.915000915527344, 9.927000045776367, 24.388294219970703, 29.648311614990234, -20.0))
cmd.png("png/multivariate_hewl_MET_105.png",dpi=900)

hide everything, anom_4s_m

isomesh anom_4s_u, anom_u, 4.0, hewl, carve=2
color hotpink, anom_4s_u

cmd.set_view((0.4992764890193939, -0.20368452370166779, -0.8421602845191956, -0.6275040507316589, 0.5852298140525818, -0.5135610699653625, 0.5974625945091248, 0.7848699688911438, 0.1643783301115036, 0.0, 0.0, -26.393409729003906, 8.09000015258789, 30.875, 16.5939998626709, 16.94440269470215, 35.842411041259766, -20.0))

center resi 3 and resn IOD
cmd.png("png/univariate_hewl_IOD_3.png",dpi=900)
